I am Bruno Ponne, I help other researchers to learn data analysis and data science. I hold a master's degree in Public Policy from the Hertie School and a Bachelor's in History from the University of Bras√≠lia.


Coding the Past is a fusion of my two passions: data science and history. I am open to collaborations and keen to help you with your data problems. I hope to connect with you shortly.
